text:
Autokroma | REMOTE | Worldwide | C Developer in Freelance | https://autokroma.com

Autokroma develops and sells “AfterCodecs”, a suite of exporter plugins for Adobe video software aiming at bringing previously unavailable codecs to these softwares, speeding up video rendering / encoding and making video professional artists’ workfow easier.

We are looking for a C developer to continue the development of our plugins. Freelance for 3 months.

More info and email contact here : https://autokroma.com/AfterCodecs/JobOffer_April_2018.pdf
